title.rendered: Top Laravel Development Companies To Hire Experts In 2025

content.rendered:
Laravel is a popular framework for website development, acquiring 25.85% of the PHP framework market share. As a most admired framework among PHP frameworks, it is being utilized for e-commerce, enterprise, social media, and ‌different ‌websites. 

More than 1 million websites worldwide are available on the web that are created using Laravel. Laravel framework is the first preference of PHP developers as it allows them to develop highly scalable, flexible, and faster web applications. 

Surely, you, too, would want to deliver a splendid and unhindered user experience to your target audience over the web. Laravel framework can help you achieve this pursuit at ease; all you need to do is hire dedicated Laravel developers from reliable & coveted hosts.

But! There is no shortage of Laravel development companies that promise to deliver an excellent solution, but only some can deliver top-notch quality. 

Therefore, we have enlisted top Laravel development companies to help you find a reliable and expert host for web development. So, stay hooked with us till the end of this article and explore the best Laravel developers in 2025. 

While creating this list, I have kept the following pointers in reflection: 

  • Years of excellence (average eight years)
  • Workfolio 
  • Rewards & Recognition 
  • Client rating & feedback 
  • Hourly/Monthly Price 
  • Number of happy clients 
  • Number of successfully launched projects 
  • Minimum man-years experience 

So, let’s not waste a minute and glance at the top Laravel development companies to hire for creating excellent web solutions.  

Top Laravel Application Development Companies  

#1. Andersen

Andersen is one of the top Laravel development companies that help small and medium-sized businesses reduce staff time, automation, and scale business processes. It aids organizations in launching digital products that deliver tangible results in terms of revenue and user value. 

The company is appreciated for helping startups successfully implement modern tech, reach a stable height and achieve business goals. The company has received several world-famous awards. From logistics to delivery service apps, the company excels in different verticals of current industry trends.  

  • Founded: 2007
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: New York City, NY

Why Choose? 

  • Procure Marvellous Application Solutions
  • Create Long-term Technology Partnership
  • Agile & Responsive Development
  • Analyze Audience Feedback
  • MVP Approach For Startups

#2. invertio

invertio is a well-known name in the space of IT outsourcing worldwide and enables businesses to hire Laravel experts at ease. Its flexible hire model allows you to acquire dedicated teams of experts in different domains & technologies. 

Its teams have comprehensive domain knowledge and technology expertise that empowers the organization to yield high-quality solutions and employ modern tech that adds value to the business.

It has delivered 4000+ projects and has 97% client retention, making the organization a reliable host for PHP website development services.

  • Founded: 2004
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 5.0/5.0
  • Headquarters: Gurugram, India 

 

 

Why Choose?

  • Highly Creative & Motivated Team
  • Your Ideas Are Safe
  • First Time Right Process
  • DevOps Enablement
  • Integrity & Transparency

#3. Bacancy Technology 

 

Innovation & Agility is the base ideology on which the company thrives and delivers professional services for web and mobile application development. It has a worldwide clientele that cherishes its work. Therefore, it excels across different domains, including healthcare, real estate, logistics, retail, and more. 

With a workforce of 500+ agile developers, the company has served Fortune 500 companies, including Disney, Fidelity, Red Bull, and many others. It is known for providing incredible technology capabilities for Ruby on Rails, React Native, AngularJS, Salesforce, and more. 

  • Founded: 2011
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.7/5.0
  • Headquarters: Ahmedabad, India

Why Choose? 

  • Agile Approach
  • Research Sprint
  • Experienced Team
  • Faster Delivery With Confidence
  • Agile Transformation To Unlock Business

#4. Cyber Duck 

The company is engaged in developing enterprise and custom software solutions for global brands, including Sport England, Cancer Research UK, GlaxoSmithKline, and more. It has various delivery centers worldwide that enable it to cover the worldwide marketplace. 

The company provides one of the most complex software engineering solutions crafted by employing the potential of modern tech. The skills of its team are incredible; thus, the company is well-known for providing highly scalable software solutions.  

  • Founded: 2005
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $100/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.6/5.0
  • Headquarters: London, United Kingdom

Why Choose? 

  • Faster Productive Delivery
  • Secure Marketing Technology Solution
  • Innovation Driven Solution
  • NDA & Transparency
  • Higher Security Solutions

#5. WPWeb Infotech 

WPWeb Infotech specializes in Laravel development and is known for innovative and agile services. It works globally across industries like e-commerce, entertainment, education, and tech. WPWeb Infotech also offers SEO and digital marketing services, enhancing online visibility and driving business growth through targeted strategies.

The team at WPWeb Infotech, consisting of over 100 dedicated developers, has collaborated with renowned clients, tailoring solutions that resonate with industry standards. The company shines not only in Laravel but also in WordPress, PHP, WooCommerce, Shopify development and many more.

  • Founded: 2015
  • Hourly Price: $25/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 5.0 /5.0
  • Headquarters: Ahmedabad, India

Why Choose?

  • Customized Solutions
  • Innovative Approach
  • Dedicated and Skilled Team
  • Timely and Reliable Delivery
  • Strategic Insights to Drive Growth

#6. Flowmatters

The company is a collaboration of passionate and skilled developers, designers, and technology experts, who are driven to bring significant changes in IT outsourcing and user experience. With this approach, the company has successfully delivered beautifully designed solutions that enable businesses to connect with customers. 

It personalizes the software solutions to the needs of businesses and industries by considering users’ needs. For over 13 years, the company has been crafting digital experiences that convert the idea of the client into a digital solution. 

  • Founded: 2004
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: Cluj-Napoca, Romania

 

Why Choose? 

  • Connect With Full-service Digital Agency
  • Custom-tailored services
  • Excellence At Ease
  • Transform Your Business
  • Intelligent Solutions

Also Read: Top 10 NodeJs app Development Companies | Updated list (2023)

#7. HighLand 

It is a team of highly experienced software developers, managers, and business analysts who are passionate and creative. Altogether, they strive to help startups and SMEs to achieve their organizational goals by yielding cloud-based development through Node.JS, PHP, React, AWS, and more. 

Its strong experience in web development makes it the best company to hire Laravel developers. With its team, it has successfully delivered DevOps, Cloud, Digital Transformation, and various business innovation services that enable the organization to connect with the modern target audience. 

  • Founded: 1999
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $150/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: Chicago, IL

Why Choose?

  • Highly Scalable Solutions
  • Validate Ideas & Agile Development
  • Reliable & Faster Delivery  
  • Transparency & NDA
  • Innovation Guaranteed

#8. Designs.codes

With over ten years of market experience, the company has successfully delivered numerous projects to SMEs and global businesses and gets on fairly with each expectation of clients. It guarantees transparent and higher-quality development for both web and mobile. 

Its team of Laravel developers are experts in other techs like node.js and JavaScript and deliver solutions that meet the user expectation and allow businesses to boost user traffic on the website and mobile app. 

  • Founded: 2011
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 5.0/5.0
  • Headquarters: Kolkata, India

Why Choose?

  • Deep Tech Expertise
  • Trial Period
  • Controlled Workflow
  • Ensure Customer Satisfaction
  • Individual Approach

Also Read:  Python Vs Java: Which Is Best For Your Business App Development?

#9. Fingent

Fingent is an award-winning Laravel development company with over 16+ years of excellence. It has delivered 700+ to its worldwide clientele across the US, UAE, Australia, and India. The company is a legal partner of Odoo and K2 for the US region.    

Over the past two decades, the company has collaborated with a number of startups and mid and large-sized enterprises and worked for big brands like Sony, Johnson & Johnson, Sapra Navara, Impact XM, and more. It has helped businesses to improve productivity to 50% and increase value by 300%. 

  • Founded: 2003
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: White Plains, NY

  • Why Choose? 

    • Best-of-breed solutions
    • Agile teams and dedicated QA
    • Transparent Project Management
    • Deadline Adherence

#10. Studio Graphene

The company is the inventor and creator of various incredible websites and mobile applications. Due to its expertise in the design and development of market-ready products, the company is coveted as a top company to hire Laravel programmers due to its excellence in developing cutting-edge solutions. 

The company helps startups navigate the journey of digital transformation from conceptualization to development. Its team works extensively to deliver a high-quality solution that helps achieve business goals. 

  • Founded: 2014
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 5.0/5.0
  • Headquarters: London, United Kingdom

Why Choose? 

  • Acquire Incredible Solutions
  • First Time Right Delivery
  • Excellent Client Support
  • Commutative & Understand Needs
  • NDA & Transparency

#11. Radixweb

RadixWeb is a trusted and trusted partner for the world’s leading enterprises for custom software development and software outsourcing services.

We bring together in-depth testing information and domain expertise with key technologies to help our customers accelerate business approaches, better performance competition, and revenue growth. Its experts with 2900+ SMBs have helped Fortune 500 companies embrace new technologies and make business changes. 

  • Founded: 2000
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour 
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.8/5.0
  • Headquarters: Artesia, CA

 

Why Choose?

  • Operational Excellence
  • Gain Powerful Insights
  • Unified Customer Experience
  • Create New Opportunities
  • Consistently Great Experience

#12. Syberry Corporation

Syberry Corporation is a well-known US-based Laravel development company located in Austin, TX. With an astonishing 94% customer retention rate and 250+ IT professionals who have developed web and mobile apps for more than 20 industries to date, the Syberry team has been recognized by Techreviewer among other prestigious publications such as Clutch, AppFutura, Forbes, and Good firms.

 As one of North America’s most sought-after companies when it comes to software engineering services at competitive prices – they provide high-quality work while maintaining top-notch customer service through long-term business relationships with worldwide clients like Walt Disney, Crux Craftforce, PayPal, Campus Suite, etc.

  • Founded: 2014
  • Hourly Price: Starting from 25/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 5.0/5.0
  • Headquarters: Austin, TX

Why Choose?

  • High-Quality Custom Solutions
  • Commutative & Understand Needs
  • First Time Right Delivery
  • NDA & Transparent
  • Excellent Client Support

#13. Buildfire 

BuildFire is a San Diego-based Laravel development company that specializes in developing apps for global leaders. They have built more than 10,000 successful products for their clients, including PepsiCo and CRH, to name just a few of the Fortune 500 companies they’ve worked with for over 7 years! 

Founded by developers who were also entrepreneurs themselves – this team understands what it takes not only to create quality software but get its customers into your organization as well so you can be ready when those all-important users come knocking on your door. 

  • Founded: 2014
  • Hourly Price: Starting from 100/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 5.0/5.0
  • Headquarters: San Diego

Why Choose?

  • Implement New Ideas
  • Design & Plan With Architects
  • Grow Your App With Strategic Consulting
  • Intuitive & Custom Solution
  • NDA & Commutative

Also Read: Know The Key Differences Between B2B and B2C eCommerce Websites

#14. Cleveroad 

Cleveroad is a full-cycle mobile and web development company having extensive expertise in Laravel development services with offices located in worldwide locations, including the USA, Norway, and Ukraine. The team boasts 120+ engineers who have been providing top Laravel app design services to their clients for 10 years. 

Started from 2011, they’ve delivered 170 B2B & C apps belonging to industries such as telecoms, real estate, healthcare, agriculture, finance tech, eCommerce more, all created using Cleveroad’s unique strategies. It should not be surprising that it is one of Denver’s most trusted companies when you consider how many awards its talented staff has won over time.

  • Founded: 2011
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: Dnipropetrovs’k, Ukraine

Why Choose?

  • High Grade Profesionalis,
  • No Bureaucracy
  • Higher Flexibility
  • Individual Approach

#15. Fatbit Technologies 

FATbit Technologies has a history of working with clients to create innovative and engaging web applications, mobile apps for iOS & Android platforms, as well as Laravel solutions. The company’s developers are dedicated to providing exceptional solutions across all aspects – from development strategy planning through implementation services or maintenance contracts following deployment on various devices belonging to Fatbit technologies.

In addition, they also offer some consulting projects that help businesses understand how different technologies can be used together more effectively, which results in successful products. 

  • Founded: 2004
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: Mohali, India

Why Choose?

  • Deliver Perfection
  • Build Trust and Be Transparent
  • Exercise Agility
  • Drive Innovation

#16.Hubspire 

HubSpire is a top Laravel development company based in New York. They have worked with businesses of every size for over 13 years, and they’re not afraid to get down and be innovative. With a graceful team that includes designers as well as developers (some are even testers!), Hubspire’s goal isn’t just making your application look good – it’s also about building something useful or functional out there on the market so you can make money off of it too. 

So they got anything from Fortune 500 companies all through small & medium-sized enterprise clients up here at the office, then give them call because chances like these don’t come along often.

  • Founded: 2008
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 5.0/5.0
  • Headquarters: New York, USA

Why Choose?

  • Always Act with Ownership
  • Support never ends
  • Focus on solutions
  • Prioritize security
  • Design for real people

#17. Sapient Pro 

SapientPro is a top Laravel development service provider that specializes in helping businesses of all sizes achieve success with their IT projects. The company was established in 2009, and it has been listed among the best B2B companies for 2019 by Clutch Magazine as well as the 2018-2019 edition. 

As seen on its website, Sapientpro offers Mobile & Web applications to various industries like logistics, education, finance, retail, etc., which can be used by business owners/managers running those types of organizations or even consumers who need help managing inventory online. 

  • Founded: 2010
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: Storozhynets’, Ukraine

Why To Choose? 

  • Coefficient evaluation
  • Estimation of accurate odds
  • Individual approach
  • Intuitive solution

#18. AltexSoft 

AltexSoft is a company that has been providing excellent service to its clients since 2007. It offers personal and business-level web development, with deep technology expertise applied by the team in order to unlock new opportunities for startups or SMBs across all dimensions of your business needs – from IT architecture through digital marketing strategies. 

You can rest assured knowing every aspect will be taken care of at an affordable price! With more than 200 satisfied customers worldwide, including Microsoft Corporation (MSFT), IT Incorporated #631 Outsourcing Company on Fortune 500 list, among others, it’s no wonder why these guys are considered one if not “the fastest growing private businesses” around today. 

  • Founded: 2007
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: Kharkiv, Ukraine

Why To Choose?

  • Vigorously get to work
  • Support For Future Business
  • Elaborate Upgradation
  • Legacy Work

#19. Intellias 

Intellias is a laravel application development services provider headquartered in Ukraine with delivery offices across Germany, Poland, and Saudi Arabia. Established in 2002, they boast 1600+ employees today who supply Fortune 500 corporations to tech innovators around the globe through custom software solutions for the automotive industry. 

It includes Big Data AI/ML or IoT as well cloud platform design – all this within their domain of expertise which covers agriculture, transportation, telecommunications, edtech, healthcare retail.

  • Founded: 2002
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.8/5.0
  • Headquarters: L’viv Ukraine

Why Choose?

  • Non-disclosure agreement
  • Integrity & Quality
  • Customer-centric solutions
  • Unique blend of technologies

#20. Apriorit

Apriorit is a software company that specializes in customizing and creating new applications to suit any need. With offices all over the world, they have had experience developing for both Android as well iOS devices – making them one of only a few companies who can do it so fluently!

Aprioriuts’ innovative engineering team has created Chrome extensions on their own time, too; this shows how talented these guys really are when given free reigns around your browser homepage or search bar page. And don’t forget: A priory also creates Windows applications with long-term support contracts included (so no worries there).

  • Founded: 2002
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: Wilmington DE

Why Choose?

  • Assistance From Geeks
  • Graceful teams
  • Balanced Application Development
  • Quality Assurance & Competence

#21. Saritasa

Saritasa is a full-source software development firm based in Newport Beach, Calif, With additional offices all over North America and Russia to boot; they’re not your run-of-the-mill company! Founded in 2005 by a strong group that provides custom application building for businesses big or small. 

Saritasa has built quite an impressive portfolio supporting its clientele with web design & mobile apps while also leading projects like IoT (internet-connected devices), AR/VR systems – you name it!. Saritasas team size ranges between 89 – 100 people, so there’s always someone there ready to help make whatever shape your idea takes come alive on screen. 

  1. Founded: 2005
  2. Hourly Price: Starting from $100/hour
  3. Reviews & Rating: 4.8/5.0
  4. Headquarters: Newport Beach CA

Why Choose?

  • Passionate & Expert Technologist
  • Innovation & Creativity
  • Integrity & Competence
  • Consistent & Upfront  

#22. SingleMind

SingleMind is an award-winning laravel design and development agency with over 14 years of experience. With around 20 employees, they offer mobile app development as well web applications like the ones found on their website: iphone X compatible apps for businesses or custom software if you need something done in a specific niche that’s out there but not yet been touched! 

Singlemind also specializes in user experience (UX) designing systems engineering IoT projects– among other things such as eCommerce solutions which are becoming increasingly popular because many people today shop online instead of visiting physical stores; so having this expertise ensures its clients will always be ahead when it comes to market intelligence.

  • Founded: 2005
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $100/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.8/5.0
  • Headquarters: Lake Oswego OR

Why Choose? 

  • Aligned & Agile Development
  • Easy-to-manage Products
  • Non-disclosure Agreement
  • Accelerate & Grow Business

#23. ClearSummit

Clear Summit has been building software for over a decade. They are based in Virginia and Los Angeles, with 22 team members who specialize in creating digital products to serve startups or corporate clients around the world.

ClearSummit designed both their internal application offering as well as providing ongoing support on this B2B Platform’s main feature set that includes many user type-specific features such as account approval process management across different apps via an easy API integration layer (SOAP).

  • Founded: 2014
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $100/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 5.0/5.0
  • Headquarters: Santa Monica CA

Why Choose?

  • Support Till Final Milestone
  • Superior Software & Experiences
  • Generate Actual Results
  • NDA & Commutative 

#24. SideBench

Sidebench is a strategy, design, and development consultancy with more than 70 experts. It caters to enterprise companies as well new ventures looking for experienced consultants who can provide both management skills alongside their technical know-how. The company offers app dev solutions through an integrated team of product specialists that aim at providing complete customer satisfaction in all deliverables they offer, including web development or UX/UI work on apps.

I’ve been following this amazing firm since its early beginnings when it was just four people trying out ideas about what kind of business might be possible—and now here it is less than five years later: Side Bench has grown into one LA-based operation servicing clients across North America. 

  • Founded: 2012
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $150/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: Santa Monica CA

Why Choose?

  • Consistent & Strategic Teams
  • UX-first approach
  • Innovation & Competence
  • Deft Management

#25. Cheesecake Lab 

Cheesecake Labs is a company that delivers apps to clients in the form of software solutions. They have locations across California and Brazil, with 60+ designers on staff working alongside engineers and project managers alike, all collaborating to deliver top-notch customer experience through their multidisciplinary team approach for iOS, Android Web platforms, including UI/UX design along with backend development & more!

From startups to small businesses or Fortune 500 companies – Cheescake Lab provides full-service development services tailored just right according to your needs. 

  • Founded: 2013
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.9/5.0
  • Headquarters: San Francisco CA

Why Choose?

  • Commitment to quality
  • Agility & Integrity
  • Seamless Collaboration
  • Continuous engagement with clients 

#26. Woodridge Software

Woodridge Software is a development agency that specializes in custom software. Founded just four years ago, they have an impressive 20 employees, and services range from startups to Fortune 500 companies, with their focus being on UX/UI design for web applications as well as mobile app building services such as iOS apps or Android version 4+ devices. 

Woodridge’s most notable project was developed at the environmental firm where data transmission could be done wirelessly between remote machines connected by Bluetooth technology; this allowed technicians easy access information while not needing cables connecting them directly together.

  • Founded: 2012
  • Hourly Price: Starting from $150/hour
  • Reviews & Rating: 4.8/5.0
  • Headquarters: Golden CO

Why Choose?

  • Digital Transformation at ease
  • Continued Development
  • No Project Risks
  • Integrity & Consistency

Have a look at the video below:

Wrapping Up 

The mentioned companies are the major providers of Laravel development services that enable the business to acquire incredible results and web applications. From the above companies, you can pick any of these, but still, you find it difficult to pick any of them; you can consult with top companies: Andersen, invertio, and Bacancy Technology.

Note: These are top Laravel development companies as per my research and understanding of their capabilities. If you want to add any company to the list, then your valuable suggestions are welcomed.
